item.description:
An Informal Minimalist Clinic Details

Ever wondered about those crazy minimalist runners? Ever wondered if they get hurt all the time and what happens when they step on rocks and twigs? Ever wondered about trying out those funky toe shoes you've seen people wearing but still have questions?

Come down to TMIRCE Saturday's at City Sports on June 11th before the run at 10:00am for the best, first ever, minimalist running clinic. 

Already run in minimalist gear? Feel free to share your story in the lightning testimonials. You'll get 30 seconds flat to share your story.

We will also be hosting Daniel Lieberman aka "The barefoot professor." He has confirmed he will attend and speak and maybe even run! Check him out here!http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7jrnj-7YKZE

The Running and Breakfast details

Running Details: Meet up with The Most Informal Running Club Ever on the Boston side of the Charles River for the weekly Saturday Fun Run. We'll split up into groups depending on the turnout for distance and time goals for 3, 4, 6 or 7 mile loops. It's your choice!

What to expect: a seriously fun group of runners who definitely do not take running too seriously. We will meet, chat, RUN, stretch, chat, EAT BREAKFAST and then leave. It's that easy.

Breakfast Details: Between 11:15 and 11:30 (depending on how long we run) we will meet at CITY SPORTS @ BU for breakfast. If you would like to bring a breakfast item to share (eggs, bagels, fruits, muffins, juice, bacon, potatoes, etc.) please feel free to do so. You are not obligated to bring anything, though, so please join us for breakfast after the run!

ALL ABILITY LEVELS ARE WELCOME!!!

Meter parking is easily accessible on Comm Ave. and also Gardner St. which runs parallel behind the store. The B train on the Green Line stops directly across from the store at Babcock St.

informalrunning.com

Read the BLOG
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be wearing our birthday suits.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS
